title: Mini-Ep 90: Warm Baths and Honest Conversations
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 90: Warm Baths and Honest Conversations
itunes:subtitle: This week’s mini-ep includes a listener-submitted theme song, a pro-paper planner voicemail with the cutest cameo ever, and tons of empathetic advice for dating with herpes. Plus: a listener shares how she’s helped her father discover the heal...
description:
This week’s mini-ep includes a listener-submitted theme song, a pro-paper planner voicemail with the cutest cameo ever, and tons of empathetic advice for dating with herpes. Plus: a listener shares how she’s helped her father discover the healing power of baths.


We love to hear from you! To leave a voicemail for a future mini-ep, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • KIND - Visit kindsnacks.com/forever35 to create your own custom variety pack, and get 2 free KIND Minis® with your order when you use code FOREVER35 in your shopping cart.
  • TodayTix - Go to todaytix.com/forever35 for $10 off your first purchase.
  • StitchFix - Get started today at stitchfix.com/forever35 and you'll get an extra 25% off when you keep all items in your box. 
  • Molekule - Use code FOREVER10 at checkout to get 10% off your first air purifier order at molekule.com.
  • Rothy’s - For free shipping and free returns/exchanges, visit rothys.com/forever35.
  • Honey - Get Honey for free at joinhoney.com/forever.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
